import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import axios from "axios" const InvoiceInfo = ({ props }) => { const handleDelete = async (_id) => { await axios.delete(`http://localhost:5000/${_id}`, { params: { id: _id } }).then((res) => console.log(res)) .catch((err) => console.log(err)) } useEffect return (
Go Back

{props._id}

Invoice Date Jun 3, 2022
Bill to: {props.clientName}
Sent To: john@johnkomarci.com
Payment Date: Aug 2, 2022

  • Detroit

Francisco Chang 1 Francisco Chang 200

) } export default InvoiceInfo
